loginRequired.title: Should be logged in to see
loginRequired.description: Add this menu item only if the user is logged in

SDBEnhancedMenu.layoutChange.title: Alter the header layout with megamenu
SDBEnhancedMenu.layoutChange.description: Check this option if you want to alter the default header styles into a megamenu layout instead

SDBEnhancedMenu.exposePromotions.title: Use promotions functionality to expose promotions to customers
SDBEnhancedMenu.exposePromotions.description: Check this option if you want to show on the header a list of applicable promotions to the customer

SDBEnhancedMenu.preventSplitCategoryTree.title: Prevent parent + child categories to be split into different columns
SDBEnhancedMenu.preventSplitCategoryTree.description: Check this option if you want to keep parent + child categories always on the same column
